abstract: The remaining public shareholders of CVR are discovering that they are in a strange sort of limbo as a result of the peace treaty the energy company’s former board entered into with Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: The remaining public shareholders of CVR are discovering that they are in a strange sort of limbo as a result of the peace treaty the energy company’s former board entered into with Carl C. Icahn.
lead_paragraph: The remaining public shareholders of CVR Energy are discovering that they are in a strange sort of limbo as a result of the peace treaty the company’s former board entered into with Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: The Strange Takeover Limbo of CVR
